content.text:
I'll help you warm up by exploring the codebase structure to get familiar with the project.

<function_calls>
<invoke name="Glob">
<parameter name="pattern">**/*.{svelte,js,ts,json}"></parameter>
</invoke>
</function_calls>

<function_results>

</invoke>

<function_results>

</invoke>
